en: Let me fill up your glass, Mr Nakauchi.
zh: 中内先生，我给您满上。

en: This is it.
zh: 就是这里了。

en: Now, I'll take your temperature.
zh: 现在，我给你量个体温。

en: Now let's talk it up.
zh: 咱们现在好好聊聊吧。

en: Let's do some boxing.
zh: 咱们练练拳击吧。

en: Let's get out of the car now.
zh: 咱们现在下车吧。

en: Let's look it up in the dictionary.

en: Come on, children, it's time for bed.
zh: 孩子们快点，该睡觉了。

en: Let's get going.
zh: 咱们走吧。

en: Now, let's begin our job.
zh: 好了，咱们开始干活吧。

en: Now let's get down to work.
zh: 好了，咱们开始干活吧。

en: Here we go.
zh: 好嘞，走起。

en: Now draw some out and take it to the master of the banquet.
zh: 现在舀一点出来，送去给管筵席的人。

en: Let's get the show on the road.
zh: 咱们这就开始吧。

en: C'mon guys, this is a party so let your hair down and relax a little.
zh: 别这样嘛大伙儿，既然是派对就放开点，放松下。

en: The ball is with you.

en: Anybody who shows up late has to chug!

en: Come on! We'll be late.
zh: 快点儿！我们要迟到了。

en: Come on, get up.
zh: 快，起来。

en: Now, go have a good time.
zh: 行了，去玩个痛快吧。

en: Here we are at the station.
zh: 车站到了。

en: Try and swim!
zh: 试着游游看！

en: Let's drink the night away.
zh: 咱们今晚不醉不归。

en: Now, listen to the doctor, or you won't get well.
zh: 听医生的话，不然你好不了。

en: Here we are finally at the airport.

en: Come on, try again.
zh: 别灰心，再试一次。

en: Now folks, let's go on.
zh: 好了，各位，咱们继续吧。

en: Let's all go to an all-you-can-eat Yakiniku restaurant.
zh: 咱们去吃日式烧肉自助吧。

en: Now, get off the boat and swim to shore.
zh: 行了，下船游到岸边去。

en: Here comes a bus. We might as well take it.
zh: 公交车来了，咱们干脆坐这趟吧。

en: Come on, Tony.
zh: 快点儿，托尼。

en: Let's break up the party.
zh: 咱们散了吧。

en: Now, are you going back to your room or not?

en: Here, please have a seat.

en: It's time to hit the books.

en: Come on, get it off your chest.

en: Come on, we'll be late if you don't hurry up.
zh: 快点，再不快点就迟到了。

en: Now give attention to what I am going to say.
zh: 好了，听好我要说的话。

en: Now, resume reading where you left off.
zh: 好了，从刚才停下的地方接着读。

en: Come on, take it easy. Chances are in your favor.
zh: 嘿，放松点，你胜算很大。

en: Now, go have a good time. The work can wait.
zh: 行了，去玩吧，活儿可以等会儿再干。

en: Let's meet Edgar Degas and look at his pictures with him.
zh: 咱们去见见埃德加·德加，一起欣赏他的画吧。

en: Oh, off with you.
zh: 哎呀，你走开啦。

en: Do you have a number where we can contact you?
zh: 有联系方式吗？留个电话吧。

en: I hope to hear from you.
zh: 等你消息。

en: Please give my kind regards to your parents.
zh: 请代我向你父母问好。

en: Are your parents in now?

en: How are your parents getting along?

en: Did your parents approve of your marriage?

en: Which of your parents do you think you take after?

en: Give my regards to your parents.
zh: 替我问候你父母。

en: Give my best respects to your parents.
zh: 请代我向你父母致意。

en: Give my best regards to your parents.
zh: 替我向你父母问个好。

en: Remember me to your parents.
zh: 替我跟你爸妈打个招呼。

en: Didn't your parents give you anything?

en: We shall be pleased to comply with your request.
zh: 我们很乐意满足您的要求。

en: I'll make every possible effort to meet your request.
zh: 我会尽力满足您的要求。

en: In accordance with your request, I enclose a picture of myself.

en: A map is available upon request.

en: We cannot meet your demands.
zh: 我们没法满足你的要求。

en: We are sorry we are unable to accept your request.
zh: 很抱歉，我们没法接受您的请求。

en: Are you being waited on?

en: Have you been waited on?

en: Is anybody waiting on you?

en: Please call me up if you want me.

en: Can I tell my father what you want?

en: Do you have a reservation?

en: Your friendship means much to me.
zh: 你的友谊对我来说意义重大。

en: Sorry to trouble you, but can you help me?

en: I am sorry to trouble you.
zh: 抱歉给你添麻烦了。

en: I'm very sorry to have troubled you.
zh: 真的很抱歉，给你添麻烦了。

en: I'm sorry to trouble you.
zh: 麻烦你了。

en: Sorry to bother you, but I'm afraid something urgent has come up.
zh: 不好意思打扰一下，我这儿突然有点急事。

en: Far be it for me to trouble you, but I must ask you something.

en: I am sorry to have troubled you.
zh: 抱歉给你添麻烦了。

en: I really appreciate all the trouble you've gone to.

en: If it's not too much trouble, I would like some help.

en: I'm sorry to trouble you, but could you tell me the way to the station?

en: God grant that you come home safe and sound.

en: I am sorry I did not write to you for such a long time.

en: I am as much in the wrong as you are about not writing before this.
zh: 之前一直没写信，我跟你一样也有不对的地方。

en: It has been a long time since I wrote you last.

en: I'll bring the book back to you tomorrow.

en: I must think it over before answering you.
zh: 我得先考虑一下再答复你。

en: The favor of a reply is requested.

en: It is nice of you to hold a door open for a lady.

en: Ladies first.
zh: 女士优先。

en: Your bereavement saddens me.

en: Please come over with your wife.

en: I hear you have been sick.

en: Wash your hands before eating.

en: Do you have rice?

en: Do you know how to cook rice well?

en: Rice is good with miso soup.

en: Which do you prefer, rice or bread?

en: I will leave it to your judgement.

en: Let's throw it away and start over with a clean slate.

en: The same to you.

en: You may have it for the asking.

en: Please accept my sympathies.

en: I'll be happy if you will come with me.

en: Boarding will be at six-forty.

en: Please have your boarding pass ready. Thank you.

en: Welcome aboard!

en: Please visit us at your convenience.
zh: 方便的时候请随时过来坐坐。

en: Make contact when it is convenient.

en: At your convenience.

en: Why don't you drop in for tea at your convenience?

en: Please come when it is convenient.

en: Do come if you can!

en: May I take a message for him?

en: Can I take a message?

en: Will you please provide more details about your proposal?

en: Please give me your attention.

en: May I take your order?

en: We will ship the product immediately after receiving your order.

en: This is the last order.

en: Would you like to order?

en: Tell me when you'd like to order.

en: May we look forward to receiving your order?

en: I'll do as you advise.

en: May you be happy!

en: Please accept my condolences on the death of your father.

en: You know, there are more and more old people.

en: As you know, we were late due to the heavy rain.

en: UN, as you know, stands for the United Nations.

en: This only takes quarters, you know.

en: As you know, life is comparable to a voyage.

en: I want to congratulate you on your graduation.

en: I leave it to your imagination.

en: I'll leave it up to your imagination.

en: As your goods for which you are charging us were imperfect, we will not pay this account.

en: Our catalog will be sent on demand.

en: I do hope you'll succeed.

en: I wish you every success.

en: Let me congratulate you on your success.

en: May you succeed!

en: A thousand thanks for your kindness.

en: I am grateful to you for your kindness.

en: I'm quite aware of your kindness.

en: I shall never forget your kindness.

en: I am so much obliged to you for your kindness.

en: I cannot thank you enough for your kindness.

en: It is kind of you to help me.

en: Your kindness overwhelms me.

en: I'm afraid I'm imposing on your hospitality.

en: I appreciate your kindness.

en: It's kind of you to say so.

en: Thank you very much kindly.

en: How nice of you!

en: I'm much obliged to for your kindness.

en: I acknowledge your kindness.

en: Thank you for your concern.

en: It was very kind of you to invite me.

en: Thank you for inviting me.

en: You see, he is a good baseball player.

en: What line of work are you in?

en: I am much obliged to you for your help.

en: I cannot thank you enough for your assistance.

en: I am more than grateful to you for your help.

en: Please sign your name here.

en: Let me know your departure in advance.

en: Let me know the time you are leaving.

en: Write your address, please.

en: Thank you for making the arrangements.

en: Is the master of the house at home?

en: I believe he'll be with us today.
zh: 我觉得他今天会和我们在一起。

en: I recommend a thorough checkup for your husband.
zh: 我建议让你老公做个全身体检。

en: Please give my best regards to your husband.

en: I understand you wish to contact your husband.

en: In respect to your question, I have nothing to say.

en: Help yourself to the fruit.

en: Please feel free to link to my page.

en: Please help yourself to the desserts.

en: Help yourself.

en: He thus revealed his glory.

en: Please make sure that your seat belt is securely fastened.

en: Did you plan it yourself?

en: Why don't you make it yourself?

en: Would it inconvenience you to go yourself?

en: What's your home phone number?

en: Please accept our heartiest congratulations on the marriage of your son.

en: For your information.
zh: 供你参考。

en: We look forward to your entries.

en: Thank you very much for attending.

en: I congratulate you on your engagement.
zh: 恭喜你订婚了。

en: I'm familiar with your name.
zh: 你的名字我听着挺耳熟。

en: I wish you good luck.
zh: 祝你好运。

en: I appreciate what you've done for me.
zh: 谢谢你为我做的一切。

en: I am deeply grateful to you for your kindness.
zh: 太感谢你的好意了。

en: I'm deeply grateful for your kindness.
zh: 真的很感谢你的好意。

en: I appreciate your thoughtfulness.

en: For your consideration.

en: Here's to your health!

en: May you be blessed with good health.

en: Are you married or are you single?

en: I wish you great happiness in your marriage.
zh: 祝你们新婚幸福。

en: I would like to extend our best wishes on your marriage.
zh: 祝你们新婚快乐。

en: We have just received an inquiry from Kansas concerning your brother.

en: You must keep in with your neighbors.

en: Thank you for your trouble.

en: Thank you in advance for your help.

en: Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

en: Thank you for your cooperation in advance.
zh: 先谢谢你的配合。

en: I really appreciate your cooperation.

en: Thank you for your kind assistance.

en: I appreciate your cooperation.

en: Thank you for your cooperation.

en: How do you feel today?

en: I am not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.

en: When you decide which plan you want, please notify us in writing.

en: Do you have a family?

en: How about your family?

en: Please remember me to your family.

en: Please remember me to all your family.

en: I'd rather not.

en: I appreciate your help.

en: I am grateful to you for your help.

en: I am willing to agree to your request.
zh: 我愿意答应你的要求。

en: The sunshine penetrated the thick leaves of the trees.
zh: 阳光穿过了树木茂密的叶子。

en: Don't run on your sentences with commas.
zh: 写句子别老是一逗到底。

en: The computer terminals were lined up in one long row.
zh: 电脑终端排成长长的一排。

en: IBM has the lion's share of the large computer market; nobody else even comes close.
zh: IBM占了大型机市场的大头，别家根本没法比。

en: The development of the computer industry has been very rapid.
zh: 电脑行业发展得飞快。

en: There are many jobs available in the computer industry.
zh: 电脑行业有很多就业机会。

en: The computer industry is enjoying a boom.
zh: 电脑行业现在正火。

en: I shopped around for my computer and ended up paying $200 less than David.
zh: 我买电脑时货比三家，最后比大卫少花了200美元。

en: We are looking for somebody who can use a computer.
zh: 我们在找会用电脑的人。

en: If you use a computer, you can retain information.
zh: 如果你用电脑，就能把信息保存下来。

en: Computers will save you much time and energy when you deal with figures and graphs.
zh: 处理数字和图表时，电脑能省下不少时间和精力。

en: Computers will save you a lot of time.
zh: 电脑能帮你省不少时间。

en: They might pay me more if I could use a computer.
zh: 要是我会用电脑，他们可能会给我涨工资。

en: Computer users have so many buzzwords, it's a wonder if anyone else can understand them.
zh: 玩电脑的人行话太多了，别人能听懂才怪。

en: In order to use a computer, you must learn to type.
zh: 想用电脑，你得先学会打字。

en: He located the computer, poured in the sample and deposited the $10.00.
zh: 他找到了电脑，放进样品，然后存了10块钱。

en: A computer is a complex machine.
zh: 电脑是个挺复杂的机器。

en: Computers are capable of doing very complicated work in a split second.
zh: 电脑能在瞬间完成极其复杂的工作。

en: A computer can calculate very rapidly.
zh: 电脑算得特别快。

en: The computer is a relatively recent invention.
zh: 电脑是比较近代的发明。

en: The computer is placed to the left of the women.
zh: 电脑放在那些女人的左边。

en: Computers are difficult, so I get confused.
zh: 电脑太难了，我老是搞混。

en: Computers are used to send messages by e-mail.
zh: 电脑可以用来发电子邮件。

en: Computers can be thought of as mere calculating machines.
zh: 电脑可以被看作仅仅是个计算机器。

en: Computers can save us a lot of time and trouble.
zh: 电脑能省掉我们不少时间和麻烦。

en: Computers can give us facts, but they can't give us experience.
zh: 电脑能提供事实，但给不了我们经验。

en: The computer is a recent invention.
zh: 电脑是近代的发明。

en: The machine again made the usual noise and printed out the following analysis.
zh: 机器又发出了往常那种声音，并打印出了分析报告。

en: The computer has made a great impact on modern life.
zh: 电脑对现代生活产生了巨大的影响。

en: A computer is an absolute necessity now.
zh: 现在电脑绝对是必需品。

en: Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work.
zh: 电脑能处理极度复杂的工作。

en: Computers have made rapid progress.
zh: 电脑技术进步飞快。

en: Computers are of great use.
zh: 电脑用处很大。

en: Computers are constantly being improved.
zh: 电脑一直在不断改进。

en: Computers have invaded every field.
zh: 电脑已经渗透到了各个领域。

en: Computers caused a great, if gradual, change.
zh: 电脑引起了虽然缓慢但巨大的变化。

en: The more I studied computers, the more interesting I came to find it.
zh: 我越研究电脑，就越觉得有意思。

en: Knowledge of computers is basic to all sciences.
zh: 电脑知识是所有科学的基础。

en: Do you know how to operate a computer?
zh: 你会操作电脑吗？

en: The use of electronic computers is growing rapidly.
zh: 电脑的使用普及得非常快。

en: What a waste to buy such an expensive machine even though he doesn't even know how to use computers.
zh: 他连电脑都不会用，还买这么贵的机器，真是浪费。

en: It's possible to branch out from computing to jobs in banking, accountancy and so on.
zh: 可以从电脑行业转行去做银行、会计之类的工作。

en: The operation of a computer keyboard requires less effort than that of a manual typewriter.
zh: 用电脑键盘打字比用手动打字机省力多了。

en: Computers save us a lot of time and trouble.
zh: 电脑能帮我们省去很多时间和麻烦。

en: Compared to a computer, a word processor has a single purpose.
zh: 和电脑比起来，文字处理器功能太单一了。

en: Put all the books about computers together.
zh: 把所有关于电脑的书都放在一起。

en: What kinds of things do you have on the computer?
zh: 你电脑里都有啥东西？

en: I feed data into a computer.
zh: 我把数据录入电脑。

en: If you don't know anything about computers, you're really behind the times.
zh: 你要是一点电脑都不懂，那可真就落伍了。

en: Computers can do the job with ease.
zh: 电脑做这活儿轻而易举。

en: Japan disproved phony accusations of computer chip dumping.
zh: 日本澄清了关于芯片倾销的虚假指控。

en: Computers are really selling like hotcakes.
zh: 电脑卖得特别火。

en: It is an advantage to be able to use a computer.
zh: 会用电脑是个很大的优势。

en: Computers have changed the industrial picture considerably.
zh: 电脑极大地改变了工业现状。

en: My computer is out of order, and I have to get it repaired.
zh: 我电脑坏了，得拿去修一下。

en: The computer broke down.
zh: 电脑坏了。

en: Computers are being introduced into this company.
zh: 我们公司正在引进电脑。

en: There is a labor shortage of computer programmers.
zh: 现在电脑程序员挺缺的。

en: The computer system shuts down automatically at 8pm.
zh: 电脑系统晚上八点会自动关机。

en: I am able to buy anything in a convenience store.
zh: 便利店里什么都能买到。

en: Hi, George! How's it going?
zh: 嗨，乔治！最近怎么样？

en: I'd like to drive across the USA in a convertible car.
zh: 我想开着敞篷车横穿美国。

en: Hi! I'm Ichirou Tanaka. Nice to meet you.
zh: 你好！我是田中一郎。很高兴认识你。

en: Hi! Thanks for flying with us. How are you today?
zh: 你好！感谢乘坐我们的航班。今天还好吗？

en: Hi! What is the purpose of your visit in America, sir?
zh: 你好，先生。请问您来美国目的是什么？

en: Good day. How are you today?
zh: 你好，今天怎么样？

en: Hi, Roger. I'm pretty good!
zh: 嗨，罗杰。我挺好的！

en: Hi, Mimi! How are you doing?
zh: 嗨，咪咪！你怎么样？

en: Hi, my name is Ken Saitou.
zh: 你好，我叫斋藤健。

en: Hi, Paul. Busy as usual?
zh: 嗨，保罗。还是那么忙吗？

en: Hello, Tom.
zh: 你好，汤姆。

en: Hi, Susan. How are you?
zh: 嗨，苏珊。你好吗？

en: Hello. Are you Jackie Scott?
zh: 你好。你是杰基·斯科特吗？

en: Hi, how are you, everyone?
zh: 嗨，大家好吗？

en: Hi! Do you work here?
zh: 你好！你在这儿工作吗？

en: Such extravagance is beyond my reach.
zh: 这种奢侈我可消费不起。

en: I have no idea what he has in mind, rejecting such a favorable proposal.
zh: 真搞不懂他是怎么想的，居然拒绝了这么好的提议。

en: We might as well eat dog food as eat such a dish.
zh: 吃这种菜还不如吃狗食。

en: He must be crazy to go out in this stormy weather.
zh: 这种暴风雨天气还出门，他肯定是疯了。

en: I cannot entertain such a request.
zh: 这种请求我没法答应。

en: What did they add this needless function for?
zh: 他们加这个没用的功能干嘛？

en: Hey! I don't want any crank calls - not at this hour.
zh: 喂！我不想接到骚扰电话，尤其是这个时候。

en: It is not safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.
zh: 女孩子这么晚一个人出门不安全。

en: What is the good of reading such books?
zh: 读这种书有什么好处？

en: It is no use reading such a book.
zh: 读这种书没用。

en: I've never tasted anything as unusual as this.
zh: 我从没吃过味道这么特别的东西。

en: You were thoughtful to remember me in this way.
zh: 你能这样记着我，真是太有心了。

en: In this way, we waste a lot of time.
zh: 这样做太浪费时间了。

en: Do it this way.
zh: 这样做。

en: This is the way he treated me.
zh: 他就是这么对我的。

en: I can't put up with these insults.
zh: 我受不了这些侮辱。

en: Never have I read so terrifying a novel as this.
zh: 我从没读过这么恐怖的小说。

en: Never have I seen such a beautiful sunset.
zh: 我从没见过这么美的日落。

en: This is the prettiest sunset I have ever seen.
zh: 这是我见过的最美的日落。

en: Have you ever seen such a beautiful sunset?
zh: 你见过这么美的日落吗？

en: Do not read books in such a dim room.
zh: 别在这么暗的房间里看书。

en: It's impossible to work in a room this dim.
zh: 房间这么暗，根本没法干活。

en: I don't feel like going out on such a day.
zh: 这种天气我可不想出门。

en: Who'd have thought this is how the pieces fit?
zh: 谁能想到事情竟然是这样的？

en: I'd rather stay home than go out in this weather.
zh: 与其这种天气出门，我宁愿呆在家里。
